description: The country closes schools and non-essential businesses in an attempt to curb the virus.
title: Covid-19: Germany introduces new restrictions amid rise in cases
title_page: Covid-19: Germany introduces new restrictions amid rise in cases - BBC News
maintext: "The number of cases is higher than ever and they keep rising. There is the danger that the situation will keep getting worse and it will get harder and harder to deal with the pandemic and its consequences," he said.
